content:
ClaimTypes Class

Definition

Represents the pre-defined types of claims that an entity can claim. This class cannot be inherited.

In this Article

public static class ClaimTypes
Inheritance
System.Object
ClaimTypes

Inherited Members

Equals(Object)
Equals(Object,Object)
GetHashCode()
GetType()
MemberwiseClone()
ReferenceEquals(Object,Object)
ToString()

Remarks

Use the ClaimTypes class to search for a particular type of claim in a ClaimSet or to create a claim. To search for a particular type of claim in a ClaimSet, use the FindClaims(String,String) method and use the properties of this class to specify the claim type for the claimType parameter. When the constructor for the Claim class is used to create a new claim, use the properties of the ClaimTypes class to specify the claimType parameter. For many of the claim types, the Claim class has static properties that return a claim of a specific type. For instance, the [CreateHashClaim(Byte<xref:System.IdentityModel.Claims.Claim.CreateHashClaim%28System.Byte%5B%5D%29> method returns a claim using the Hash claim type.

Properties

Anonymous

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user.

public static string Anonymous { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/anonymous.

Authentication

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated.

public static string Authentication { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authentication.

AuthorizationDecision

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity.

public static string AuthorizationDecision { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authorizationdecision.

Country

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the country/region in which an entity resides.

public static string Country { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies a country/region in which an entity resides.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/country.

DateOfBirth

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the date of birth of an entity.

public static string DateOfBirth { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the date of birth of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dateofbirth.

DenyOnlySid

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only security identifier (SID) for an entity.

public static string DenyOnlySid { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only SID for an entity.

Remarks

A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object.

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/denyonlysid.

Dns

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the DNS name associated with the computer name or with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X.509 certificate.

public static string Dns { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the DNS name associated with the computer name or with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X.509 certificate.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dns.

Email

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the email address of an entity.

public static string Email { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the email address of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/emailaddress.

Gender

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the gender of an entity.

public static string Gender { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the gender of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/gender.

GivenName

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the given name of an entity.

public static string GivenName { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the given name of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname.

Hash

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a hash value.

public static string Hash { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies a hash value.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/hash.

HomePhone

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the home phone number of an entity.

public static string HomePhone { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the home phone number of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/homephone.

Locality

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the locale in which an entity resides.

public static string Locality { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the locale in which an entity resides.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/locality.

MobilePhone

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the mobile phone number of an entity.

public static string MobilePhone { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the mobile phone number of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/mobilephone.

Name

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity.

public static string Name { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/name.

NameIdentifier

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity.

public static string NameIdentifier { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/nameidentifier.

OtherPhone

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the alternative phone number of an entity.

public static string OtherPhone { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the alternative phone number of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/otherphone.

PostalCode

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the postal code of an entity.

public static string PostalCode { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the postal code of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/postalcode.

PPID

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the private personal identifier (PPI) of an entity.

public static string PPID { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the private personal identifier (PPI) of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/privatepersonalidentifier.

Rsa

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies an RSA key.

public static string Rsa { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies an RSA key.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/rsa.

Sid

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a security identifier (SID).

public static string Sid { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies a security identifier (SID).

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/sid.

Spn

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a service principal name (SPN) claim.

public static string Spn { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies a service principal name (SPN) claim.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/spn.

StateOrProvince

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the state or province in which an entity resides.

public static string StateOrProvince { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the state or province in which an entity resides.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/stateorprovince.

StreetAddress

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the street address of an entity.

public static string StreetAddress { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the street address of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/streetaddress.

Surname

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the surname of an entity.

public static string Surname { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the surname of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/surname.

System

Gets the URI for a claim that identifies the system entity.

public static string System { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that identifies the system entity.

Remarks

The System is typically used to identify the issuer of a claim when the issuer is the current application.

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/system.

Thumbprint

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint.

public static string Thumbprint { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint.

Remarks

A thumbprint is a globally unique SHA-1 hash of an X.509 certificate.

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/thumbprint.

Upn

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a user principal name (UPN).

public static string Upn { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies UPN.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/upn.

Uri

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies a URI.

public static string Uri { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies a URI.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/uri.

Webpage

Gets the URI for a claim that specifies the Web page of an entity.

public static string Webpage { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a claim that specifies the Web page of an entity.

Remarks

The string returned by this property is http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/webpage.

X500DistinguishedName

Gets the string that contains the URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate.

public static string X500DistinguishedName { get; }
Value
String

The URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate.

Remarks

The X.500 standard defines the methodology for defining distinguished names that is used by X.509 certificates.
